Package UserCode.Behaviours

Interface Summary
IBistable IBistable: a two-state variable; essentially a bi-stable 'flip-flop' (or two-element state machine).
IDumbVariable IDumbVariable: interface for a variable without any behaviour - just mutation.
ILinearVariable ILinearVariable: a 'smart' variable with a linear change, which changes direction when it reaches the upper or lower limit.
ISpawnablePool ISpawnablePool - an object pool of specific ISpawnables having the same parameters, used to implement a particle system.
IVariable IVariable: the top level interface for any smart 'variable'.
 

Class Summary
Bistable Bistable: a two-state variable; essentially a bi-stable 'flip-flop'.
BistableTest The test class BistableTest.
DumbVariable DumbVariable: implements a variable with only access and mutation.
LinearEventVariable LinearEventVariable inherits LinearVariable.
LinearVariable LinearVariable: implementation of ILinearVariable - a 'smart' variable with a linear change, which changes direction when it reaches the upper or lower limit.
LinearVariableTest The test class LinearVariableTest.
SpawnablePool Abstract class SpawnablePool - common code to implement an 'object pool' of specific ISpawnables.
Variable Abstract class Variable - implements the common functionality for any smart variable.
